column5: Hi everyone, newbie to the board but I’ve been visiting for several months now and it seems like a great place to chat and exchange info. I’m from the Caledon area and enjoy all species but my true love is all types of trout (especially specs). I was going to join the board in the next couple of weeks because my wife and I are expecting our first little fisherperson in the next 7 days but after reading the post by “Steverowbotham” on Barrie specs I couldn’t resist. You guys & gals have a GREAT thing happening on this board, good for u.
Welcome Brookster. Lots of good speck fishing in yer neck of the woods.Use to fish it alot,even married a gal from Caladon.  Welcome and thanks for the intro.
Welcome to the family try not to become as addicted as I am.  Looking forward to your Trouting outing pics and reports.  MTP
Welcome to the board and Congratulations on your soon to be arriving new fishing partner!!!   All the best in this new adventure!  Bly

Welcome brookster.  Congrats to the expecting mother and father  ... my best to you all.    I think a nice little fishing outfit would be just the thing for your fishing partner.  Once he/she is old enough ... spend all the time you can, you'll never regret it and only deepen your bond.
Welcome to the board and all the best with the little one!
Welcome Brookster.  Lots of good people with extensive info hear.  I'm sure you'll enjoy the board.  Corn Nug
Welcome aboard Brookster....Throw a log on the fire and the cold ones are in the cooler over by picknick table....

Hey there!  Welcome to the board...it was a very nice intro.  Congrats to you and your wife on expecting your first child!!!  Pull up a chair and stick around...there's hours of entertainment/info on this board.  Cliff
Welcome brookster ... always room for another speck lover ...
